#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   long i;
   char standard[100000];

   cin>>standard;

   for(i=0;standard[i]!='\0';i++)
   {

     switch(standard[i])
     {

       case '1' : cout<<"pa"; break;

       case '2' : cout<<"re"; break;

       case '3' : cout<<"ci"; break;

       case '4' : cout<<"vo"; break;

       case '5' : cout<<"mk"; break;

       case '6' : cout<<"x";  break;

       case '7' : cout<<"zi"; break;

       case '8' : cout<<"bi"; break;

       case '9' : cout<<"so"; break;

     }

   }

   return 0;

}
